content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=6.5, y=-59.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=6.5, y=-59.5) and offshore pump(position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=63.0, y=-54.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace at position(x=63.0, y=-54.0)

### Iron plate mine at position(x=61.0, y=-54.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace at position(x=61.0, y=-54.0)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when placing entities too far away
-  Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to place before placing entities
### Errors when placing entities in occupied tiles
-  Ensure you can place a entity to a tile before attempting placing
### Errors when removing entities
-  Ensure the entity can be removed before attempting removal
### Errors when crafting entities
-  Ensure all required ingredients are available in the inventory before attempting crafting
### Errors when using pickup_entity function
-  If the first argument is an Entity object, the second argument must be None
